pr_title: RouteGuideClient example: use E7 format for latitude & longitude

timeline.bodyText: nit: it's hard to count how many zeros are there. 10_000_000 might be better.
timeline.author: dapengzhang0

timeline.message:
RouteGuideClient example: use E7 format for lat/long

As indicated in the proto file, point coordinates are in degrees encoded in E7 format.
https://github.com/grpc/grpc-java/blob/master/examples/src/main/proto/route_guide.proto#L54
